queries.title: 3. Math functions
queries.description: ADQL queries using the mandatory mathematical and trigonometrical functions (cf 2.3 in ADQL-2.1).

query.adql: SELECT TOP 1 abs(-3.14) AS "ABS", truncate(ceiling(313.6)/100, 2) AS "CEILING", truncate(degrees(0.054803338512622), 2) AS "DEGREES", truncate(exp(1.1442227999201620), 2) AS "EXP", truncate(floor(314.3)/100, 2) AS "FLOOR", truncate(log(23.103866858722183), 2) AS "LOG", truncate(log10(1380.3842646028848), 2) AS "LOG10", mod(7.14, 4) AS "MOD", truncate(pi(), 2) AS "PI", round(power(1.772004514666935, 2), 2) AS "POW", round(radians(179.908747671078)*100)/100 AS "RADIANS", truncate(sqrt(9.8596000000000000), 2) AS "SQRT", round(3.14278210, 2) AS "ROUND", truncate(3.1499999999, 2) AS "TRUNCATE" FROM stars
SELECT TOP 1 acos(1) AS "ACOS", asin(0) AS "ASIN", atan(0) AS "ATAN", atan2(0,1) AS "ATAN2", round(cos(pi()/2)) AS "COS", sin(0) AS "SIN", tan(0) AS "TAN" FROM stars
